name: Generate CSV Organizational Chart Data Using Manager Information
author: Stuart Morgan <stuart.morgan@mwrinfosecurity.com>
description:
This module will generate a CSV file containing all users and their managers, which can be
        imported into Visio which will render it.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: The domain to query or distinguished name (e.g. DC=test,DC=com)

options.name: MAX_SEARCH
options.description: Maximum values to retrieve, 0 for all.

options.name: ACTIVE_USERS_ONLY
options.description: Only include active users (i.e. not disabled ones)

options.name: STORE_LOOT
options.description: Store the organizational chart information in CSV format in loot

options.name: FILTER
options.description: Additional LDAP filter to use when searching for users
